input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Tie Bar"
Reference Product Name: "Non-Iron Dress Shirt"
Reference Product Description:
Meet your new wardrobe staple. This must have textured solid dress shirt is perfect for any occasion, keeping you looking your absolute best at work and on the weekends. Available in trim fit and standard fit. Need help finding your shirt size? Check out our Shirt Size Guide for the perfect fit.
Collar Style: Semi-spread. A popular collar style that has a wider spread between the collar points to accommodate the widest range of tie knots. Also the best collar type to dress down and wear without a tie.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Brooks Brothers Men's Stretch Supima Cotton Non-Iron Pinpoint Oxford Polo'
  - Name='Brooks Brothers Men's Big & Tall Non-Iron Windowpane Sport Shirt'
  - Name='Brooks Brothers Men's Regular Fit Non-Iron Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Brooks Brothers Stretch Regent Non-Iron Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Brooks Brothers Men's Stretch Supima Cotton Non-Iron Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Brooks Brothers Men's Stretch Cotton Non-Iron Oxford Polo'
  - Name='Brooks Brothers 346 Non-iron Button Up Shirt Red Checkered Pattern,'
  - Name='Brooks Brothers Men's Big & Tall Non-Iron Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Brooks Brothers Men's Big & Tall Outlined Check Non-Iron Dress Shirt'
  - Name='J.Crew Men's Mercantile Long Sleeve Slim Untucked Flex Shirt'
  - Name='J.Crew Men's All-Day Performance Shirt'
  - Name='Brooks Brothers Men's Stretch Supima Cotton Non-Iron Oxford'
  - Name='Brooks Brothers Men's Explorer Collection Non-Iron Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Charles Tyrwhitt Men's Non-Iron Stripe Twill Shirt'
  - Name='Egara Men's Skinny Fit Dot Dress Shirt'
  - Name='L.L.Bean Men's VentureStretch Woven Shirt'
  - Name='Brooks Brothers Non-Iron Stretch Dobby Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Brooks Brothers Mens Shirt 16.5 35 White Purple Milano Fit Non Iron'
  - Name='Brooks Brothers Shirts | Brooks Brothers - Menâ€™s Blue Relaxed Fit Dress Shirt, Non-Iron With French Cuff | Color: Blue | Size: 17bt | Rustypedals's'
  - Name='Brooks Brothers Men's Stretch Non-Iron Oxford Button-Down Collar Short-Sleeve Sport Shirt'
  - Name='Brooks Brothers 1818 Regent Non-iron Blue Dress Shirt Men's Size'
  - Name='Brooks Brothers Men's Stretch Cotton Non-Iron Pinpoint Polo'
  - Name='Brooks Brothers Men's Big & Tall Non-Iron Check Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Charles Tyrwhitt Men's Non-Iron Stretch Oxford Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Thomas Mason for J.Crew Men's Washed Cotton Poplin Shirt'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Brooks Brothers Men's Stretch Supima Cotton Non-Iron Pinpoint Oxford Polo
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a polo shirt, which differs in silhouette and intended usage from the dress shirt, though it shares non-iron and material features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Brooks Brothers Men's Big & Tall Non-Iron Windowpane Sport Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A non-iron sport shirt is similar in construction but generally more casual than a dress shirt; big & tall fit aligns with sizing but function is slightly different.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Brooks Brothers Men's Regular Fit Non-Iron Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A non-iron dress shirt with regular fit closely matches the reference product in type, fabric treatment, and purpose.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Brooks Brothers Stretch Regent Non-Iron Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A non-iron dress shirt with stretch and a specific cut (Regent) very similar to the reference dress shirt in function and style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Brooks Brothers Men's Stretch Supima Cotton Non-Iron Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This product matches the reference closely: non-iron, dress shirt, stretch, and Supima cotton material.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Brooks Brothers Men's Stretch Cotton Non-Iron Oxford Polo
scores_with_rationales.rationale: As a polo shirt, this differs significantly in form and usage from the dress shirt despite similar fabric traits.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Brooks Brothers 346 Non-iron Button Up Shirt Red Checkered Pattern,
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A non-iron button-up shirt is related, but the pattern and potential casual style reduce direct relevancy to a classic dress shirt.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Brooks Brothers Men's Big & Tall Non-Iron Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Non-iron dress shirt with big & tall sizing is closely relevant to the reference shirt's category and function.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Brooks Brothers Men's Big & Tall Outlined Check Non-Iron Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A non-iron dress shirt with outlined check pattern and big & tall sizing remains relevant but the patterned style slightly lowers relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: J.Crew Men's Mercantile Long Sleeve Slim Untucked Flex Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A slim, flex shirt potentially overlaps with casual dress shirt territory, but 'untucked' and likely performance fabric make it less formal than the reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: J.Crew Men's All-Day Performance Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Performance shirt suggests a focus on casual or athletic wear, differing from the formal non-iron dress shirt.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Brooks Brothers Men's Stretch Supima Cotton Non-Iron Oxford
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Likely a shirt made from Oxford cloth, a dress or casual shirt material; closely related but material may differ in texture from reference shirt.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Brooks Brothers Men's Explorer Collection Non-Iron Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A non-iron dress shirt is highly relevant though the specific 'Explorer Collection' may affect style or fit.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Charles Tyrwhitt Men's Non-Iron Stripe Twill Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Non-iron dress shirt with a stripe and twill weave is relevant, though twill texture and pattern style differ slightly from the reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Egara Men's Skinny Fit Dot Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Dress shirt with skinny fit and dot pattern shares category but differs in fit and pattern styling.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: L.L.Bean Men's VentureStretch Woven Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Woven shirt with stretch; likely more casual or outdoor oriented than a formal non-iron dress shirt.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Brooks Brothers Non-Iron Stretch Dobby Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A dress shirt with non-iron and stretch features is very relevant; dobby weaving adds texture but is common in dress shirts.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Brooks Brothers Mens Shirt 16.5 35 White Purple Milano Fit Non Iron
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Non-iron shirt in a specific 'Milano' fit is closely relevant to the reference based on construction and function.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Brooks Brothers Shirts | Brooks Brothers - Menâ€™s Blue Relaxed Fit Dress Shirt, Non-Iron With French Cuff | Color: Blue | Size: 17bt | Rustypedals's
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Non-iron dress shirt with relaxed fit; French cuffs add some formality but overall very similar in nature to the reference shirt.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Brooks Brothers Men's Stretch Non-Iron Oxford Button-Down Collar Short-Sleeve Sport Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Short-sleeve Oxford button-down sport shirt is more casual with less formal collar style than the semi-spread dress shirt.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Brooks Brothers 1818 Regent Non-iron Blue Dress Shirt Men's Size
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Non-iron dress shirt from a known line with 'Regent' fit is highly relevant and matches the dress shirt category well.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Brooks Brothers Men's Stretch Cotton Non-Iron Pinpoint Polo
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Polo shirt silhouette and usage diverge from a dress shirt despite similar fabric and non-iron attributes.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Brooks Brothers Men's Big & Tall Non-Iron Check Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Non-iron dress shirt with check pattern and big & tall sizing shares strong relevancy though pattern and sizing differ slightly.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Charles Tyrwhitt Men's Non-Iron Stretch Oxford Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Non-iron stretch Oxford dress shirt closely matches the reference in fabric, function, and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Thomas Mason for J.Crew Men's Washed Cotton Poplin Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Washed cotton poplin shirt is a dress shirt style, but washed finish may reduce formality relative to non-iron shirts.
